q1.name: Piltover Peacemaker
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Caitlyn''' fires a piercing shot in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy it passes through, after which it expands in width but deals only 60% damage to enemies it passes thereafter.
Enemies {{tip|true sight|revealed}} by {{ai|Yordle Snap Trap|Caitlyn}} always take {{ccs|full damage|physical}} from ''Piltover Peacemaker''.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Caitlyn fires a piercing shot in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy it passes through, after which it expands in width but deals only 60% damage to enemies it passes thereafter.
Enemies revealed by Yordle Snap Trap always take Unknown value: ccs full damage physical from Piltover Peacemaker.
q1.notes:
* Enemies hit while protected by a {{tip|spell shield}} will still be considered a target for calculating damage for subsequent hits.
* ''Piltover Peacemaker'' will fire from wherever '''Caitlyn''' was at the start of the cast time.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ % AD)
  • Reduced Damage: (+ % AD)

r1.name: Ace in the Hole
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Caitlyn''' locks onto the target enemy champion and {{tip|channel|channels}} for 1 second, {{tip|sight|revealing}} herself in the process while {{tip|true sight|revealing}} them for {{fd|2.75}} seconds from the start of the cast time.
''Ace in the Hole'' is placed on a 5-second {{sti|cooldown}} if canceled.
Once '''Caitlyn''' completes the channel, she fires a homing bullet toward the target that deals {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy champion it hits.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Caitlyn locks onto the target enemy champion and channels for 1 second, revealing herself in the process while revealing them for 2.75 seconds from the start of the cast time.
Ace in the Hole is placed on a 5-second cooldown if canceled.
Once Caitlyn completes the channel, she fires a homing bullet toward the target that deals physical damage to the first enemy champion it hits.
r1.notes:
* The following will cancel ''Ace in the Hole's'' channel (mana expenditure is not compensated):
** '''Caitlyn''' is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}.
** The target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}.
** '''Caitlyn''' or her target {{tip|death|dies}}.
** '''Caitlyn''' uses {{si|Flash}}.
* {{tip|Nearsight}} will specifically not block the {{tip|true sight}} from ''Ace in the Hole''.
* The ability also goes on a 5-second {{sti|cooldown}} if '''Caitlyn''' enters {{tip|resurrection}} during the cast time.
** The cast time does not end prematurely but the channel will be immediately canceled the moment the cast time completes.
* If the target dies, becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, or '''Caitlyn''' loses {{tip|sight}} of them during the cast time, ''Ace in the Hole'' cancels but does not go on {{sti|cooldown}} nor consumes any {{tip|mana}}.
* If the target dies after the bullet has been fired, the shot will continue towards their corpse and may still hit other enemy champions.
** If the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}} after the bullet has been fired, the projectile will be {{tip|homing projectile destruction|destroyed}}.
* The bullet has a {{tip|sight}} radius of 1500 attached to it.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Caitlyn''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=false|move=false|cast=false|items=false,true,false,false,false}}
r1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|90 to 60}}|Starts on cast}}' as '0/60/30/0' and riot's value '90,75,60' as '90/75/60'

i1.name: Headshot
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Caitlyn's''' basic attacks generate a stack of ''Headshot'' {{tip|on-attack}}, doubled when attacking from {{tip|brush}}. At 6 stacks, or 5 while in ''brush'', '''Caitlyn's''' next [[basic attack]] has an {{tip|uncancelable windup}} and deals {{as|({{pp|key=%|50 to 100 for 3|1 to 13}}|ad}} {{as|+ {{critical damage|{{tt|109.375|62,5% multiplied by standard critical damage factor}}|62.5}} critical strike chance|critical chance}}{{as|) AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, increased to {{as|(100%|AD}} {{as|+ {{critical damage|{{tt|109.375|62,5% multiplied by standard critical damage factor}}|62.5}} critical strike chance|critical chance}}{{as|) AD}} against non-champions.
'''Caitlyn''' may fire more than one empowered basic attack until ''Headshot'' hits a target, which consumes all stacks.

Enemies that step over a {{ai|Yordle Snap Trap|Caitlyn}} or are hit by {{ai|90 Caliber Net|Caitlyn}} can grant an additional ''headshot'' against them at {{sti|range|1300 range}} for {{fd|1.8}} seconds, without consuming stacks of ''Headshot''. Basic attacks that use granted ''Headshots'' have a {{fd|0.25}}-second cast time.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Caitlyn's basic attacks generate a stack of Headshot on-attack, doubled when attacking from brush. At 6 stacks, or 5 while in brush, Caitlyn's next basic attack has an uncancelable windup and deals (1 to 13 â€’ undefined + (+ IE 25%) critical strike chance) AD bonus physical damage, increased to (100% + (+ IE 25%) critical strike chance) AD against non-champions.
Caitlyn may fire more than one empowered basic attack until Headshot hits a target, which consumes all stacks.
Enemies that step over a Yordle Snap Trap or are hit by 90 Caliber Net can grant an additional headshot against them at 1300 range for 1.8 seconds, without consuming stacks of Headshot. Basic attacks that use granted Headshots have a 0.25-second cast time.
i1.notes:
* The bonus range from {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}} will not have any effect during {{ai|Yordle Snap Trap|Caitlyn|trap}} and {{ai|90 Caliber Net|Caitlyn|net}} extended ''Headshot'' attacks.
* Only the ordinary {{as|100% attack damage}} portion of the attack can critically strike. The bonus from ''Headshot'' is added after the critical strike is rolled.
** The full damage of ''Headshot'' applies {{stil|life steal}}.
** {{pending for test}} ''Headshot'' is a single instance of damage, thus does not trigger {{cais|Tantrum|Amumu}} or {{iis|Warden's Mail}} passives twice.
* Attacking {{tip|ward|wards}} or [[jungle plants]] will still generate stacks towards ''Headshot'' but the empowered attack will not be consumed.
* The basic attack triggering ''Headshot'' can {{tip|critically strike}}, but ''Headshot's'' damage remains unchanged if it does.
* Ability-granted ''Headshots'' are abilities that apply [[on-hit]] effects. They will not interact with effects that apply [[on-attack]] (including stacking ''Headshot'').
** {{tip|Energized}}, which normally stacks [[on-attack]], has been special cased to stack [[on-hit]] for these empowered attacks.
** {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} {{nie|Wind's Fury}}, which is normally triggered [[on-attack]], is special cased to trigger from these empowered attacks and search targets with the increased range aswell.
* The bonus damage applies to {{tip|turret|turrets}}.
* Because ''Headshot'' stacks are generated [[on-attack]], {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} bolts will not generate stacks towards ''Headshot''.

w1.name: Yordle Snap Trap
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Caitlyn''' periodically [[stock]]s a ''Yordle Snap Trap'' charge, up to a maximum amount.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Caitlyn''' sets a visible {{tip|untargetable}} trap at the target location which grants {{tip|sight}} of the area for 1 second and arms after 1 second, lasting for a duration. After the maximum amount of traps is laid down, deploying another immediately destroys the oldest one.

The next enemy champion that springs the trap is {{tip|root|rooted}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, {{tip|true sight|revealed}} for 3 seconds, takes additional damage from {{ai|Headshot|Caitlyn}}, and becomes immune to further ''Yordle Snap Traps'' for 3 seconds.

''Yordle Snap Traps trigger simultaneously if stacked on top of each other, granting additional {{ai|Headshot|Caitlyn|Headshots}} for each one beyond the first, but only increasing the damage for the first one.''
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Caitlyn periodically stocks a Yordle Snap Trap charge, up to a maximum amount.
Active: Caitlyn sets a visible untargetable trap at the target location which grants sight of the area for 1 second and arms after 1 second, lasting for a duration. After the maximum amount of traps is laid down, deploying another immediately destroys the oldest one.
The next enemy champion that springs the trap is rooted for 1.5 seconds, revealed for 3 seconds, takes additional damage from Headshot, and becomes immune to further Yordle Snap Traps for 3 seconds.
Yordle Snap Traps trigger simultaneously if stacked on top of each other, granting additional Headshots for each one beyond the first, but only increasing the damage for the first one.
w1.notes:
* If ''Yordle Snap Traps'' are stacked on each other while the target is already ''rooted'' by one, the target is immune to them for:
** 2 seconds for the 2nd and 3rd trap.
** 3 seconds for the 4th and 5th trap.
** Completely immune to them after the 5th trap.

effects.str: • Headshot Damage Increase: (+ % bonus AD)

e1.name: 90 Caliber Net
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Caitlyn''' fires a net in the target direction and {{tip|dash|recoils}} 390 units in the opposite direction. The net deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 50% for 1 second.
'''Caitlyn''' will not dash backwards if she is {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} or {{tip|ground|grounded}} during the cast time.
'''Caitlyn''' can cast any of her abilities while {{tip|dash|dashing}}.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Caitlyn fires a net in the target direction and recoils 390 units in the opposite direction. The net deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and slows them by 50% for 1 second.
Caitlyn will not dash backwards if she is immobilized or grounded during the cast time.
Caitlyn can cast any of her abilities while dashing.
e1.notes:
* ''90 Caliber Net'' will be cast from wherever '''Caitlyn''' is at the end of the cast time.
* The recoil can be used to pass through terrain.
